channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘The Penguin’ Won These Eight Emmys Before The Main Show Even Started
item.description: The Penguin is a rare superhero show racking up Emmy awards, mainly because it's not really a superhero show, but a crime drama.

item.title: Review: Blueprints: How Mathematics Shapes Creativity
item.description: This book is a fun and fascinating read — for mathematicians, artists and other creatives, and even for the general public.

item.title: ‘Demon Slayer: Infinity Castle’ Arrives With A Stunning Rotten Tomatoes Score
